abstract: Stocks in the United States were dragged lower by the energy sector after the government announced on Tuesday that it was opening investigations into the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
snippet: Stocks in the United States were dragged lower by the energy sector after the government announced on Tuesday that it was opening investigations into the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
lead_paragraph: Stocks in the United States were dragged lower by the energy sector after the government announced on Tuesday that it was opening investigations into the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico, The New York Times’s Christine Hauser reported.

headline.main: Oil Spill Inquiry Chills Traders at the Close
